lyrics: Last Christmas君がいた去年の冬が恋しくてThis year　引きずってまだ進めない My heart足跡がつくくらいに雪が積もって街は真っ白に変わってゆく綺麗な思い出色してる気づけば時は過ぎて一年も経ったまだ引きずっては下を向いてこの胸は扉閉ざしてるあの日のまま私は動けないあの日のまま時間が凍ってるだけどもうここにはきっと探してたものなんてないよLast Christmasこれ以上この恋のせいで泣きたくないThis year　探すんだ私だけの Specialいつだって恋は私を傷つけていつだって恋は涙で終わらせるでもねいつか信じてるの心に灯がともるような愛Last Christmas君よりも大切な人見つけるよNext year　幸せをきっと掴むから...Last Christmasこれ以上この恋のせいで泣きたくないThis year　探すんだ私だけのSpecialLast Christmas君よりも大切な人見つけるよNext year　幸せをきっと掴むから...
translated_lyrics: Last Christmas, I was in love with the winter of last year, and I still don't do this. My heart is snowing, and it's snowing, and it's a beautiful thing. It's a beautiful thing. It's a beautiful scenery. It's a year later, and it's closed, and I'm closing the door. I'm not going to move on that day. I'm sure the time is freezing. ♫ I don't want to cry ♫ ♫ This is the love of this year ♫ ♫ This is my year. ♫ ♫ I think that love will hurt me ♫ ♫ I believe in love ♫ ♫ I believe in love ♫ ♫ I believe in love ♫ ♫ Love, Last Christmas ♫ ♫ I'll find someone more important than you ♫ ♫ Next year, I'll grab a happy ♫Last Christmas, I don't want to cry because of this love anymore. SpecialLast Christmas, I'll find a man more important than you, and I'll find another Next year happiness.
